bow: needing input about dealing with breastfeeding in public so never noticed before but now that have an infant realize that in my city you just dont see many babies they exist surely but where are they then went out with my baby and needed to breastfeed found spot where there werent any trafic and breastfed and realized omg it is permitted but people are not confortable with it at all the next day we went out again for an ice cream and she started cueing me for feed and cried little when she cried everyone looked at me and got so uncomfortable hid in the car to breastfeed while my family went walking without me and people that saw me breastfeeding in the car were looking at me which made me uncomfortable so am thinking am supposed to just hide until she doesnt eat so much because people are uncomfortable it kind of suck that our society has sexualized the breast so much when it has purpose feeding babies it is legal where am but people are anyway what do you do do you still breastfeed in public do you mind how do you deal with getting out of the house with an exclusively breastfed baby that do not take the bottle yet just want to add in years here have never seen anyone breastfeed in public which is kind of weird no wish the mentality would be little closer to france yeah people can be jerks but ve long since gotten past caring about that my son is 21 months and still nurses occasionally if he wants to nurse while we re out somewhere let him if someone stares or throws disapproving look throw big smile back at them ve been confronted once when my son was younger and asked to take it to the bathroom smiled and replied thanks for your opinion have nice day and continued exactly where was let them be the only ones impacted by their opinions keep on feeding your baby anytime they need to be fed if anyone has an issue with it that their problem so breastfeeding in public is allowed where am us however like you it is seriously frowned upon where live to the point that people will approach you about it typically old people and or the uneducated who feel the need to talk about modesty this fact makes me feel very uncomfortable and sometimes unsafe to do so so feel your anxiety pain when do feel comfortable or safe to breastfeed in public usually ask the place where am if they have quite spot can go to nurse most places will either tell me to feel free to nurse where am or will offer place not bathroom for me to go if they do then nurse in my car or somewhere else out of the way as much as possible it sucks and is not ideal wish felt safe to breastfeed wherever needed to but do always best of luck think you should get one of those boob hats to put on your baby when nursing in public they pretty much say come at me bro to anyone who is staring but seriously though at the beginning when was adjusting to nursing in public had this really soft really light really pretty silk ish scarf that used to cover myself and the baby had so many people say oh you can even tell there was baby under there it helped also at first felt like the only person ever nursing in public and like everyone under the sun was staring at me but think that was actually mostly my anxiety as time went on got comfortable and stopped feeling like people were staring and started noticing other moms nursing hadn noticed them before just like most people weren actually noticing me always good to have go to snarky response ready just in case someone does think they need to say something saw video yesterday where someone told this woman to cover up so she kept nursing but did it with blanket on her head it was brilliant do see lot of baby feeding happening in public and when did it was roughly nursing bottle when it comes to feeding my child idgaf try to keep nipple amp boob exposure to minimum and might use large muslin to cover myself if feel uncomfortable nurse in public because the alternatives are either not to leave the house for more than hours or let baby go hungry say nope to both it did take me few tries before felt confident about nursing in public my advice to you respond to early cues nurse before the crying starts crying baby people looking nurse when baby starts fussing and they probably wo even notice she there look at your baby or phone so you do see the disapproving stares alternatively look around the establishment act like you re doing nothing wrong be surprised by the lack of disapproving stares hopefully remember people looking does mean they disapprove it just different and different makes people look even look for few seconds when see mother nursing never noticed nursing moms before had my own baby think it just not on your radar now spot them from afar just like babywearing is it legal didn know it was illegal at the end of the day if your baby needs feeding then sod all the morons who frown upon it people need to seriously grow up plus they don have to look they can just go about their day really don understand why people have an issue with it think that all women should be able to feed their babies wherever they feel comfortable that being said although it legal where live was still way too uncomfortable to breastfeed in full view of the public have bigger boobs so it harder to be modest while feeding unless used cover and my son had enough problems trying to breastfeed without one and like you barely saw anyone feeding their babies in public both before was pregnant and after my son was born used to drive my husband to work school every day while was on maternity leave so it was inevitable that have to feed in public feed him in the car used to park my car in the furthest corner of the lot or under tree or basically anywhere where when fed my son the side of the car was on was obscured still caught the occasional glance but always told myself it was because was hanging out in the backseat in parking lot not because was breastfeeding which could be true who knows employed this tactic whenever we went anywhere else fed him in the parking lot at the mall we paid and boxed up our food whenever he started getting fussy at restaurant just so could feed him in the car it worked pretty well for me and my husband was totally on board with chilling with me in the car except when he had to be at work of course was personally more comfortable breastfeeding in the car while in public but if you do like that idea then do do whatever makes you comfortable your baby is hungry and her need to eat is more important than anyone else turned up nose my youngest is months old fed him anywhere we are days ago we were at pretty crowded zoo and he was hungry fed him while walking around really dgaf anymore what people may think if they say anything the law is on my side and not letting anyone else comfort come before my baby needs if you can have the attitude of idgaf then own it fed in the car the first few times just bc wasnt confident in my ability after that would feed him anywhere now that he is pushing dont nurse in public bc he obviously does need it and just wants to comfort nurse but the other day in lowes he was acting fool and well boob fixed everything it just takes practice for me it came when we took our month old to nyc for week and had to breastfeed in public over and over otherwise would have been able to do anything you get really good at positioning baby so you are confident there is as little as possible showing the crying and fussing bothers you less and think when you are more calm with your crying baby you attract less attention early on it helped me to stay 100 focused on my baby while feeding did even look up or around me so did have to see disapproving looks it really is less noticeable than it looks have had people come sit next to me or talk to me so many times who were surprised was breastfeeding in the uk and used to work at an activity centre wife of staff member was breastfeeding in the dining room usually this was even worth commenting on but we had an additional support needs adult group in and there was lot of staring and laughing and generally the meal was being disrupted who cares if it gets bit loud but with this group disrupted meal could take twice as long and mess up the timing of the rest of the day cue staff working late or shortened activities for the participants the cook could see this as it started and after thinking about it for while and watching it get worse they asked the mother to move to different room the problem was with her normally she be left to it it was with the behaviour caused in the participants and the ultimate knock on effect she kicked off and ranted about it for days appreciate the problem with this had it been typical situation but it was am wrong to think she overreacted when lived in san francisco never saw people out with babies do remember ever noticing nursing mom in public in portland there are wayyyy more young families see nursing mom once week probably maybe you are right still breastfeed in public if my son hungry he going to eat if someone has problem with it tell them to look somewhere else nobody is forcing them to stare at me feeding my son wish had your confidence with my first definitely struggled with the feeding capes and hiding in my car which specifically bought for the dark tinted rear windows when shows up next month want to believe ll be the super mom in public carrying nursing kid casting dare you looks at anyone who feels compelled to judge me removed\ still breastfed in public and ignored the looks the only negative comment ever received for breastfeeding was at bbq at friend house so not exactly public but not at home either guy walked up behind me craddle nursing my week old son using nursing tank top it was july so it super hot and he peered over my shoulder he then freaked out and said thought he was just sleeping and nearly ran out the back door he apologized to my husband for looking at me when was feeding my kid insert huge eye roll here my husband responded with do care if she walks around topless and you see her she is feeding my baby love that man guy told my husband that his wife was old school and only fed their son at home good for her not stopping my life because you saw the top of my breast that you would have seen if was wearing bikini the horror haha the only reactions got in public were super positive the one that sticks out in my mind the most was biker guy came up to me at coffee shop and said hope you do mind me saying this but think you re an awesome mother for taking such good care of your baby have grandchild who was born two weeks ago and just love seeing young mothers out and about feeding their babies it beautiful he was this tough looking leather wearing biker guy and was not expecting that at all now when am out and about and see mother nursing her baby just smile at her and keep on going about my business just hope to send little positive energy her way to know there are people in public who support her decision to breastfeed in public her and her baby right to be fed were infringed upon because of some laughing adults would be pissed off too should have told them to cut it out instead of telling her to leave have kids and nursed of them ve fed my babies anywhere was although at first did go hide in the bathroom and struggle with covers but got tired of that quickly and ve never had negative breastfeeding comment from anyone think we think people are looking at us more than they actually are it takes while to get confident about it with my first would try to avoid it or use my car or find places that were quiet where could kind of hide but over time as got better about it and could do it without showing the world everything it became much less of an issue also find it helps to not read into looks so much it easy to think people looking at you are judging you or think you re gross or whatever but would put good money on it that most of the people looking at you probably were thinking anything negative and might have only been noticing and moving on with their day know ve been guilty of accidentally making mom feel uncomfortable when watched her nurse did really mean to but it reminded me of when my first was small and seeing her nurse was bringing back good memories oops mom wherever you are you are good mom and you looked super sweet with your baby and op consider some people looking may actually feel positively about you so anyway things that helped me be more confident practicing at home in front of mirror my kids did like covers so learned to pull my shirt up and do things in pretty discreet way pulling shirts down or having bare chest always felt awkward to me ymmv found pulling my shirt up kept my chest covered and made it all easier special nursing tops momzelle made drape front top that was so discreet have conversations with people for minutes before they realized was nursing making eye contact with people smiling etc that how learned most of the people looking were really crappy people they were just noticing it fine to seek out quiet spots etc baby is less distracted that way and it more relaxing but looking back feel silly about going to the car etc that said it just takes some time and experience to get your confidence up remember it normal most people do notice of those who notice most do really care it fine if read that correctly it was special needs group which could probably complicate things little bit when it comes to just telling them to cut it out my issue is the nipple shield that we have to use weeks on and still pretty clumsy with it especially if baby is squirming and crying and pushing it away it makes things sooo much harder we went to the beach last week and got so shy and fumbled with the shield for rough minute or so and got several awkward stares before he finally latched on breastfeed for 20 months anytime anyplace my daughter was hungry no one every approached me if someone had approached me would take it as teaching moment the only place covered up was at relatives house who happens to be mormon covered because knew it made them uncomfortable my boobs not that actual feeding and have lot of respect for them strangers dgaf about making them uncomfortable the more they see it the more common it will become was nervous about nursing in front of people when my first child was newborn when she was about weeks old we went to mall and was nursing her while waiting for my husband and his friend who were shopping thought was doing good job of covering up then store manager approached me and told me could nurse in the store got so mad went home and researched and found out that the law said that could nurse anywhere was allowed to be even went back to the store the next day with print out of the law after that my attitude totally changed guess being criticized like that just brought out the mama bear in me instead of being nervous was ready to nurse anywhere that was when my baby needed to even printed out little cards with copy of the law on them in case someone gave me hard time again nobody ever did by the time had my 2nd baby it was total non issue just nursed anywhere and did even think twice about it removed\ my lo is months and breastfed and still breastfeed her wherever felt like if we were out in public opted use cover for my own comfort but it didn matter that people knew was feeding my lo always wins over screams group of special needs adults could still be told how inappropriate they are and be gently educated the language and way of putting it over may be different but they re still capable of learning nursing tops definitely help me be more comfortable covers did really work for us but the nursing tops made all the difference was very nervous about breastfeeding in public with my first baby and always used cover when did with baby just really stopped caring and now breastfeed whenever and wherever ve never head anyone ask me cover up and ve actually had people make supportive comments on several occasions you re right though now that think about it you do see whole lot of women out nursing seems much more common to see baby with bottle the same ve only had two but as soon as got the uncomfortable stare or several quick glances just started feeding in the car if was out sorry wasn brave enough to do it more than once but applaud whoever wants to it that or not ever leave ur house if you feel uncomfortable try using lightweight cover so you feel little more private if you feel fine about it who cares what others think removed\ the shirt method one to pull down and one to pull up and feeding him as soon as he began cuing but before he was fussy crying he was hungry meant that most people did even notice was breastfeeding they though he had fallen asleep breastfed in church shame can ask generally where you live in the dc metro area and have never gotten peep of negativity no side eyes or comments it really does need to be normalized everywhere do think ppl realize just how often newborns eat yup the question is where have breastfed haha my accountant office grocery store library hiking my office aquarium downtown baby is hungry and ve got life to live as far as can tell no one really pays attention to baby happily eating and if they do they re not offended location may vary suppose which is shame got lots of looks but no one ever said anything or was rude to me went out all the time breast fed her anywhere do not hide away until she done nursing or people will never become desensitized and bfing will not be normalized always either carried blanket to cover up with or pumped beforehand and brought bottle or two with me personally do feel comfortable exposing myself but that just me if out in public and notice someone breastfeeding openly just avert my eyes and continue on my way lol not overly fond of seeing women breastfeeding with their whole boob out but just mentally go oops just looked at her boob and walk away some people have staring problem though or feel the need to say things to the mother which is awful do breastfeed anymore but what did help and helps my friends are having clothes made for easy access breastfeeding that way you can access your breasts and you do need cover as some babies dislike covers maybe we are more power in numbers too but what also seems to help is to just not pay much mind to what people think used to think be judged for being for formula feeding mom in the sea of breastfeeding moms but no one says anything good luck it legal where everyone is if you re in the states because bfing is legal in all 50 states anywhere mother can legally be struggled with bfing in public so stayed home lot in the beginning then discovered the two shirt method and my kid got better at nursing also stopped giving af
